thread.title: Is Karishma Tanna Dating This TV Hottie?
thread.title_full: Is Karishma Tanna Dating This TV Hottie?

author: Sukriti Gumber
title: Is Karishma Tanna Dating This TV Hottie?
text:
Sukriti Gumber Mar . 6 . 2017 Karishma Tanna 
Karishma Tanna was last seen in Life OK’s Nagarjuna: Ek Yoddha, which got wrapped up recently. Rumours are now doing the rounds that she is dating her show’s co-star, Pearl Puri . The duo reportedly kept bumping into each other at various events and soon developed a connection. 
However, Karishma reacted to the rumours and told TellyChakkar : 
I want to date Brad Pitt since he and me both are single, hope you got the answer. 
Pearl also denied the rumours, saying: 
There is nothing like that. I am used to this thing where every actress I hang out with or even talk to, is linked with me. Apparently, whenever I am with my co-star or even any other actress from the industry, I am dating all of them. Still, I would like to clarify that I am not dating anyone. 
Well, okay then!
